Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.49

European Chocolate Made with Alpine Milk

A raspberry cream filling is irresistible enough, but when you combine it with Milka Chocolate it then becomes, exquisite! Milka Rasberry Cream Chocolate Bar is smooth and creamy, made with fresh milk from the Swiss Alps. The raspberry cream inside is topped off with a layer of extra raspberry sauce making it doubly exceptional. A satisfying gourmet Milka Chocolate Bar that is a must try!
100 g Chocolate Bar

entry.title: Milka Darkmilk Alpine Milk Chocolate Bar - 85 g
entry.summary:
Vendor: Mondelez
Type: Chocolate
Price: 2.49

European Chocolate Made with Alpine Milk

Have you heard about the delectable taste of alpine milk but never thought you'd experience it? Well, here's your chance! Milka Darkmilk Alpine Milk Chocolate Bars are made with milk and dark chocolate and bring you the best of European-made chocolate.

Imported from Europe especially to delight your palate, Milka Darkmilk Alpine Milk Chocolate Bar is available in single bars or 12-count boxes. Why not go all out and give yourself and your family the treat of a full box? Might as well get your chocolate stash stocked up!

Milka is a legendary brand in Europe, and you will find out why once your order gets to your door.


85 g Chocolate Bar

European Chocolate Made with Alpine Milk

Europe is famous for its chocolate. Milka Darkmilk Raspberry Chocolate Bar will show you why that continent is so renowned for its delectable indulgences.

This decadent bar is made in Europe with real Alpine milk. It's certainly something you won't find at your corner store. Give yourself a gourmet treat with Milka. You can buy one bar or truly indulge and stock up with a 12-count box.

Milka Darkmilk Raspberry Chocolate Bars combines the fruity taste of raspberry with smooth, classic alpine milk and dark chocolate. You simply cannot go wrong. Introduce the whole family to the luxurious taste of European chocolate and put in your order.
